name: Shroom Crunk
description:
A little game about a young Shroom Crunk finding its purpose in the world. 

W- Move Forward

A- Move Left

S- Move Down

D- Move Right

Spacebar- Jump

Credits:

Sam Trapp: Programming, Design

Shawn Hayes: Programming, Narrative, Design

Clay Brooks: Art, Design

Justin Ankenbauer: Sound

Shaders from https://www.patreon.com/minionsart/posts

Made for https://itch.io/jam/gamesplusjam3
